name: KLJ Square Sector 83 Gurgaon,
tagline: KLJ Square Bookings Open For Retail shops, Office space and studio Apartments or service apartments Sector-83 Gurgaon
body:
KLJ Sector 83 Gurgaon
![](http://www.aurumestates.com/original_booking_img/klj-square-image.jpg)

KLJ Developer is launching new commercial project in sector 83 Gurgaon besides Hyatt Regency Gurgaon. KLJ is introducing Retail shops, Office space and studio Apartments or service apartments in sector 83 Gurgaon. It is best commercial project for investment proposes in sector 83 Gurgaon. The KLJ commercial (retail shop, office space and studio apartments) project tower shares boundary with Hyatt Regency and Hotel Hilton (Coming Soon) both are five star hotels in sector 83 Gurgaon. Both boundaries are touching with 5 star hotels and main gate is located in front of NH 8 or Gurgaon Jaipur highway.

    Sector-83 on Main Nh-8
    Hyatt Regency
    Hotel Hilton
    Less than 500M from NH 8 Toll
    Metro Rail Connectivity

KLJ Studio Apartments

KLJ studio apartments are starting from 51 to 76 Lac. The size of KLJ Studio Apartments is starting from 600 to 900 sq.ft. The Basic Selling Price of studio apartment is 85, 00/- per sq.ft. The main advantage of studio apartment is getting 12% assured return till Possession. It is best advantage of the KLJ studio apartments sector 83 Gurgaon.
KLJ Retail Shops

KLJ Retail Shops are starting from 43 to 95 Lac. The size of KLJ Retail Shops is starting from 415 to 900 sq.ft. The Basic Selling Price of Retail Shops is 10, 500/- per sq.ft (First Floor) and 13, 000/- per sq.ft (Ground Floor). The main advantage of studio apartment is getting 12% assured return till Possession. It is best advantage of the KLJ Retail Shops sector 83 Gurgaon.
KLJ Office Space

KLJ office spaces are starting from 45 to 67 Lac. The size of KLJ office spaces is starting from 600 to 900 sq.ft. The Basic Selling Price of office spaces is 75, 00/- per sq.ft. The main advantage of office spaces is getting 12% assured return till Possession. It is best advantage of the KLJ office space sector 83 Gurgaon.

BSP :
8500 P.Sq.Ft.*(For Studio Apartments)
7500 P.Sq.Ft.(For Office Space)
13,000 P.Sq.Ft.(For Retail Shops-Ground Floor)
10,500 P.Sq.Ft.(For Retail Shops-First Floor)

12% Assured Return till Possesssion

Sizes: 600, 750, 850, 900 SqFt.

Booking Amount: 3 Lacs (For Studio and Office Space), 6Lacs (For Retail Shops)
